description: Arrival day in Tokyo! Landing at Haneda Airport, traveling to Shibuya, starting your cultural journey with your first goshuin at Ebisu Shrine, experiencing the famous Shibuya crossing, and celebrating your first night in Japan at A10 nightlife venue.

activities.description: Arrive at Tokyo International (Haneda) Airport (HND), Clear immigration, collect luggage, and go through customs
Airport to Ebisu Station via Keikyu Line and JR Yamanote Line

Visit Ebisu Shrine to purchase Goshuincho and receive first goshuin | [Ebisu Shrine](https://maps.app.goo.gl/6bjWpLGNd6te9iqE8) | [Shrine Store](https://maps.app.goo.gl/GsJNyLmWwg3JBntX9) | [Shrine Site](https://jinjamemo.com/archives/ebisujinja.html)
Train from Ebisu to Shibuya Scramble Crossing via JR Yamanote Line
Visit Shibuya Scramble Crossing - visit Starbucks on 2nd floor of Tsutaya for aerial view | [Tsutaya](https://maps.app.goo.gl/3mX9Z8v3mU6y2b9K8)
Visit Pok√©mon Center Shibuya (6th floor of PARCO building) | [Pok√©mon Center Shibuya](https://maps.app.goo.gl/8mXG7bX4o7tX9m3K8)
Dinner in Shibuya - explore side streets for ramen, sushi, or department store food halls
Shibuya ‚Üí A10 (Roppongi): JR Yamanote Line to Shimbashi ‚Üí Tokyo Metro Ginza Line to Toranomon-Hills ‚Üí 5 min walk
üçª Visit A10 - Tokyo nightlife experience in Roppongi area to celebrate your first night in Japan! Perfect way to experience Tokyo nightlife after your arrival day (2 hours)
activities.notes: Perfect way to celebrate your first night in Japan and experience Tokyo's famous nightlife scene

reservations.name: HJ PLACE SHIBUYA Airbnb
reservations.description: Modern Tokyo accommodation in Shibuya district with easy access to train lines and city attractions

transportation: Keikyu Airport Line to Shinagawa, then JR Yamanote Line to Ebisu. Total cost: ~¬•510, Time: 45-55 minutes

travelRoutes.name: Haneda Airport to Ebisu Station
travelRoutes.description: Airport arrival to accommodation area via Keikyu Line and JR Yamanote Line

travelRoutes.name: Ebisu to Shibuya Scramble Crossing
travelRoutes.description: Train from accommodation area to famous Shibuya crossing for sightseeing via JR Yamanote Line

meals: Dinner: Shibuya restaurants (ramen, sushi, or department store food hall)
budget: ¬•5,000 - ¬•10,000 (includes transport ¬•660, Goshuincho ¬•2,500, goshuin ¬•500, meals, nightlife & activities)
notes: Pick up Suica/Pasmo card at airport for easy train travel. Shopping List: Suitcase, Sling bag, Shopping Bag, Toiletire, Water Bottle
